about_the_game:
«Object N» is a experimental hardcore retro game that tries to achieve aesthetics of old shooters such using modern open source Quake engine fork. In addition to graphical improvements (bump mapping, per-pixel lighting), the new engine adds new mechanics for movement, excessive gore effects, COOP mode and more.

The setting moves us to the Cold War. Step into the boots of a special Soviet engineer, dispatched to the clandestine government facility known only as «Object N». As you arrive, a mysterious disaster has struck, leaving the once-secret underground science center in chaos, now under military occupation. Uncover secret areas, solve puzzles, and confront unknown threats as you ascend from the depths to the surface.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood, firefights, corpses, dismemberment and mutilation scenes.

detailed_description:
«Object N» is a experimental hardcore retro game that tries to achieve aesthetics of old shooters such using modern open source Quake engine fork. In addition to graphical improvements (bump mapping, per-pixel lighting), the new engine adds new mechanics for movement, excessive gore effects, COOP mode and more.

The setting moves us to the Cold War. Step into the boots of a special Soviet engineer, dispatched to the clandestine government facility known only as «Object N». As you arrive, a mysterious disaster has struck, leaving the once-secret underground science center in chaos, now under military occupation. Uncover secret areas, solve puzzles, and confront unknown threats as you ascend from the depths to the surface.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2000 MHz processor
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB video card
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2.1; >glibc 2.23
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB video card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2.1; >glibc 2.23

short_description: A classic-style hardcore dynamic shooter which takes place in a science underground center.
